column1: Licensed vehicles at the end of the quarter by body type, Great Britain from 1994 Q1; also United Kingdom from 2014 Q3
1. Includes rear diggers, lift trucks, rollers, ambulances, Hackney Carriages, three wheelers, tricycles and agricultural vehicles.
2. A comparison between the stock at the end of the quarter with the stock at the end of the same quarter of the previous year.
